demographics.family_status: Single or newly married, no kids

goals.primary: Find reliable products with strong value for money
goals.secondary: Reduce post-purchase regret via credible reviews
goals.discovery: Use social search and video reviews to validate options
goals.long_term: Build a durable, minimal set of essentials

marketing_strategy.messaging: Lead with total cost of ownership and proof of durability.
marketing_strategy.offers: Bundle savings, free first exchange, transparent shipping policies.
marketing_strategy.targeting: Retarget visitors who checked sizing and warranty pages.
